unnormalised: And then there’s the hall ticket saga. Losing that precious piece of paper is practically a rite of passage. The frantic search, the desperate calls to the school, the existential dread… it's all part of the exam experience. Just remember to keep a digital copy next time. Learn from my mistakes, kiddos. I once spent a solid 3 hours convinced that I'd accidentally used my hall ticket as a bookmark in my history textbook *during* the history exam. True story.
